outline:
1. to slip away, escape, deliver, save, be delivered
    1. (Niphal)
      1. to slip away
      2. to escape
      3. to be delivered
    2. (Piel)
      1. to lay, let slip out (of eggs)
      2. to let escape
      3. to deliver, save (life)
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to give birth to
      2. to deliver
    4. (Hithpael)
      1. to slip forth, slip out, escape
      2. to escape
kjv_def: deliver (self), escape, lay, leap out, let alone, let go, preserve, save, [idiom] speedily, [idiom] surely.
strongs_def: properly, to be smooth, i.e. (by implication) to escape (as if by slipperiness); causatively, to release or rescue; specifically, to bring forth young, emit sparks
